column5: You?
*A Giant Ape stalks the party from above...*
I don‚Äôt get your last sentence?

Interesting.


Can I ask you something? Does anyone have any idea as to when ‚Äòsocial interaction‚Äô will be common and normal? At that point I know we‚Äôd have made progress.
Ehhh really? That‚Äôs weird. Are you sure? Confused.
If men and women have different physical attributes, why wouldn‚Äôt they have differing mental attributes?
I thought men and women literally interpret situations differently so doesn‚Äôt that mean they‚Äôre different?
Actually while on this subject why are women so sensitive about their appearance? I mean who cares what some asshole thinks.

Hmm... What do you think of ‚ÄòInstagram models‚Äô? Are they artificial people who just care about their million likes or whatever?

I mean looking pretty is great... but you can see where I‚Äôm going with this.
Or *you* produce CO2 but allegedly it just stays in the mask and you breathe it in. Allegedly.
So we shouldn‚Äôt leave the house because we might die?
Sarcasms?
What the? Someone should die because they didn‚Äôt wear a mask? Let‚Äôs not have a witch hunt.
Invade you‚Äôre an asymptomatic?
Has anyone heard anything about stores opening up on the 28th? Masks required? Also doesn‚Äôt keeping a mask on for hours at a time produce CO2 which you breathe in?
I mean... we have been on lockdown for seemingly months now yeah?
Recommended?
In that case, try and find a new DM. That‚Äôs toxic behavior and not worth your time.
Ask him if he‚Äôd mind if you went around killing NPCs he cares about.

Also I mean is it ‚Äòbad‚Äô I use FB? Mass data collection and all?

I appreciate the information. It looks like wikis might be my go-to? Hmm...
Well I‚Äôve been hurt by people of all of those categories and what does that mean? Those people‚Äôs interactions with others seem to go sour. What‚Äôs the point?
I mean he was being sarcastic or...?
Have you ever had wayyy too much weed and started overthinking things you haven‚Äôt thought about in years?
I thought having wayy too much weed makes people overthink things and such? And if it causes us to overthink things, and if we can‚Äôt help it, then what?
That‚Äôs not ganja though
Oh no... I think I‚Äôm way too high! I‚Äôm kinda shaking... what can I do?

But why would you do that in a less understanding mood? What would be the point of it? Lulz? Trololol? 

Ah, in my honesty I‚Äôm glad you regretted that. Obviously you wanted to have good vibes with this friend, right? Yeah I‚Äôve seen some bad pics. 

While that edible metabolizes? Interesting... correspondence, ya know?

Maybe I‚Äôm overthinking things but let‚Äôs assume our intent is to enjoy life with an extra dose of happiness what‚Äôs the point of smoking weed all the time? I suppose my new revelation is that while smoking weed is great and all, helps with a variety of issues, but if you get an extra dose of happiness everyday, when does extra turn into routine? Low tolerances are great and feel the much like the first time, yeah?

Ahh... I thought being a daily smoker with kief for one of my fairly stressful months gave me a high tolerance. 200mg edibles told me different. 

Thankfully I got CBD.

Ah I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs noobs, it‚Äôs mean people. I mean you‚Äôre nice and the other guy is obviously. Oof. I don‚Äôt wanna throw up. I can already feel fairly high, I think I‚Äôm gonna smoke some CBD. First time anxiety?

The last time I thought my tolerance was ‚Äòhigh‚Äô I had two 100mg edibles *and* a (bowl + kief) and couldn‚Äôt stop shaking, and I had no CBD. It was bad. 

Like you mean you can just ease your anxiety away if you do something you enjoy?
Woah. How does it smoke?
I got water! Also I‚Äôm smoking cigs too... :/
I think I can already feel 150... I got that familiar relaxed feeling :P

Oh no :(

Advice? Also it‚Äôs kinda weird this community can be helpful and sometimes it can be toxic/condescending.
So moving out means nothing? Okay Mr. Legal Expert. Next time I move out somewhere, I‚Äôll just move in unexpectedly in a few months because it‚Äôs okay.

What should I show the landlord? I doubt he‚Äôd think ya know, to contact the landlord.


Also to give you an idea of my brother... about year ago before he moved out he mentioned [landlord‚Äôs name]. I was like:

> Who‚Äôs that?

> Don‚Äôt worry about it.

When I confronted him about the imaginary lease he had no words either.

Not that I know of. But regardless, moving out is moving out. I think he‚Äôs just using the technicality that we‚Äôre family to claim he ‚Äòstill lived in the house‚Äô or some BS. He literally just paid to store equipment during those months. 

He gave me 2 weeks of notice or whatever that he was moving out, then left.

How do I sound 12? What kind of a 12 year old uses language like this? His home? It‚Äôs *our* home. Like I said, were both tenants.


And how exactly can a person move out of a house, suddenly move back in, and claim to have full reign of things going on? Doesn‚Äôt make too much sense to me.

There is no lease; my brother has a 5-minute conversation with the landlord saying he could live there.

And if he actually does take me to court what about all the threats, intimidation, etc? Last week he got two inches from my face, I told him 3 times to back up, he didn‚Äôt, I push him away, and he punches me cuz ‚Äòself-defense‚Äô.

Okay Mr. Legal Expert, I have a friend who‚Äôs known the landlord for 20 years so surely things wouldn‚Äôt be that bad. And I‚Äôve heard things about him being super chill. 

Nothing I say happens will likely matter? In what regard? 

Enjoy my visit by the police? Okay Mr. Legal Expert. Thanks for the warning. I will enjoy the visit by the police and will invite them for tea and cookies. I appreciate your cordial and polite message; we all do.
Tpose? Heehee what is this Gary‚Äôs Mod?
Uhh... really dude?

Can I ask you a question? My aggressive brother is claiming to evict me yet plenty of people on /r/advice say he has no case, yet people on /r/legaladvice say he does. What gives?

Also there‚Äôs no lease.
Is it true that essential workers are being considered for something like a 25k bonus? Is that a rumor? It would be awesome if true.

Then I‚Äôll just contact the owner of the house if we‚Äôre going to get into nitpicky BS with ‚Äòmultiple landlords‚Äô which is misleading and confusing.

This is ridiculous. I‚Äôm being punished by someone who claims it‚Äôs ‚Äòhis house‚Äô and is abusive, etc, and even though he literally moved out he somehow retained all rights now only to the house, but to being my ‚Äòlandlord‚Äô as well. That doesn‚Äôt make too much sense. How can one claim to move out temporarily but literally say they‚Äôre moving out, and that was implied indefinitely.

This pedantic BS doesn‚Äôt make any sense and I ought to just call the literal owner of the house.

Interesting. What do you mean by certain things? Like spider webbing blocking them? Yeah I gotcha. 

Which side mission? Like one of the ones they haven‚Äôt done in Phandalin? Crap it doesn‚Äôt help they‚Äôre all on their way to Wave Echo Cave.

Hmm... crap.

Some guy on /r/legaladvice said my brother is my landlord? Uhh... I the owner of the house is the landlord? Otherwise the term wouldn‚Äôt really mean anything. He also said my brother has the right to evict me? Wait what? Under what grounds? Because I didn‚Äôt listen to his commands or agree with him 100% or whatever? 

He also moved out for 3 months during the winter, literally said he was moving out and did. Then unexpectedly came back and ‚Äòdemanded his room back‚Äô because aggression gets what you want, right? 

Does that count for anything? Logic says it should. You can‚Äôt just move out of a residence, come back unexpectedly, then claim your moveout was ‚Äòtemporary‚Äô, which is what happened.

Wait how can my brother claim to be a landlord when he doesn‚Äôt own the house nor the property?  Also claiming it be ‚Äòhis house‚Äô is lying and misinformation. Doesn‚Äôt landlord literally mean the one who owns the house?

Also how can you say those things are irrelevant? If he does bring me to court out of spite or whatever, I‚Äôm sure the judge would love to hear how much I‚Äôve been threatened, intimidated, etc because I ‚Äòdidn‚Äôt follow his commands‚Äô or whatever. And I have video proof of him threatening to destroy my belongings in his rage because I challenged what he said or whatever. 

Also what about the grandfather law? I thought tenants who have stayed for X time are legally considered tenants?

Maybe I‚Äôll contact the owner of the house and property if push comes to shove.

Wait really? The other people on /r/advice says he has no case. Uhh... that‚Äôs kinda scary. Will the court even hear him with the threats, intimidation, and all that BS? Would they take him seriously? I‚Äôm still worried about the 30 days because it undoubtedly won‚Äôt be enough time and I really don‚Äôt feel like moving back in with my parents, that‚Äôs another issue.


Also there is one other matter. Between the months of mid-October to early January this year, he literally moved out. Admittedly I had a low-payment because I don‚Äôt technically have a room, so I took his room when he moved out. I took the higher payment when he was gone. He moved back in unexpectedly, and within a few weeks said he wants ‚Äòhis room‚Äô back because it‚Äôs ‚Äòhis house‚Äô, and it was ‚Äònon-negotiable‚Äô. He also took the higher payment again. I asked a reliable family member and they said I should give him the room back to avoid issues. 

Does that moving out actually count for anything? He just paid to store equipment at the house while he moved out. I wasn‚Äôt thinking, and I just paid him the rent which he paid the landlord or whatever. Obviously I didn‚Äôt anticipate this kind of a mess.

Thanks for listening. I am kinda worried.... if he decides to write down 30 days notice, what do I do? Also I have accounts I‚Äôve friends about his behavior, I‚Äôve recorded him in his rage, I‚Äôve vented about it online. Do any of those help? Am I overthinking things?

I have been avoiding him for the most part.
Is the entire world going to die because I walked past someone?

It‚Äôs not necessarily a verbal dispute considering he‚Äôs threatened me, threatened to break my stuff, and attempted to intimidate me plenty of times. I mean what kind of a case would he have?

He has more money than me.

I mean he *could* lie, but I have plenty of accounts of his behavior. Granted they‚Äôre by me, but I‚Äôve vented to friends plenty of times and they could support me in that case. But that does kinda sound like worst case scenario.

I have no money for that. What‚Äôs there to talk with a lawyer about? The other commenter said no lawyer will take the case anyway. And what‚Äôs the judge going to do; believe 100% of his words?
Not necessarily?
Whatever. Then undoubtedly someone would‚Äôve been close to me and probably would‚Äôve said the same thing *or* could‚Äôve just ignored me and moved on.
Can I ask you to review my most recent post about him wanting to ‚Äòevict me‚Äô? I try to do that, I haven‚Äôt been engaging with him, and he‚Äôs approached me more than I‚Äôve approached him.

He claimed he can ‚Äòkick me out in X days‚Äô because we ‚Äòdon‚Äôt get along‚Äô and I‚Äôve been avoiding him since. Is there any legality to his statement?

He also said:

> Oh I can change the locks, I‚Äôm not stupid!

> No one said you‚Äôre stupid?

One day he‚Äôll be like:

> Oh you‚Äôre a good brother!

The next day he‚Äôll do this BS.

Thanks for the reassurance. That‚Äôs what I figured. He also claimed I ‚Äòhave 7 days to move out‚Äô since the original ‚Äònotice my was 14 days ago or whatever. 

Funny thing? I told my helpful family members I‚Äôd do my damndest to avoid him (to not give him any excuses). In fact, he‚Äôs approached me more than I‚Äôve approached him. And I‚Äôm sure he has some mental issues other than narcissism; one minute he‚Äôll be silly and make jokes from our childhood the next minute he mentioned the ‚Äòmoving in with our other brother‚Äô thing.

Also he used to always bring up ‚Äòhis house‚Äô as I said, and I asked to see the lease when he‚Äôd bring it up, he claimed he couldn‚Äôt do it, I ask someone who‚Äôs known the landlord for 20 years and they said:

> Yeah Landlord doesn‚Äôt do leases. It‚Äôs just a 5-minute conversation saying you can live here.
What would the EU and US gain from hiding the virus?
That seems like wayyyy too much work that it‚Äôs worth.
Have you heard of the song Inn by the Forest? It‚Äôs one my favs. :)

This is explained in the post. It‚Äôs neither of ours and there have been plenty of times he‚Äôs said ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs my house!‚Äù and I just reply:

> Sure thing [landlord‚Äôs name].
Correct... basically ‚Äòtold me‚Äô I‚Äôm paying a cut.
You being sardonic?
Who cares? He wanted it done should‚Äôve done it himself instead of attempting to give orders then got pissy when I didn‚Äôt follow them.

Who cares when it was last done? Maybe you don‚Äôt know this but I‚Äôm perfectly capable of making decisions myself.

I asked him to do it because it was his turn.

Fair point. I will do my best to ignore my brother. Apparently the bill will be $37 for each of us per month. 

Regardless, he was kinda condescending and talked over me so I left and he was like:

> Oh... uhh you can talk.

Typical asshole brother ya know?
And how am I supposed to get to work without a car?
In the middle of a pandemic? Sounds far-fetched to me. How is that supposed to work? Also I don‚Äôt have a car. And I don‚Äôt have a ton of money... with what jobs available?
No they initially hid it from the rest of the world allegedly.
While we‚Äôre on this topic should I try playing the Ironsworn game? I heard World of Dungeons is more streamlined.
Last I heard the Chinese literally hid the virus‚Äô existence. Also the US can be a clusterfuck but isn‚Äôt necessarily so.

Good tool though. I like it.

[Universal NPC Emulator is also highly recommended.](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/m/product/134163)
On one hand people ‚Äòshouldn‚Äôt be near each other‚Äô but on the other hand we ask how long?

Do phone calls and video chats even count as human interaction? It‚Äôs depressing. You can‚Äôt even have a drink with your friend in a private setting otherwise the results allegedly would be worse than nuclear warfare.

Ruins it for the rest of us? Why would the US be responsible for a subset of people‚Äôs actions?

The world is being punished. China fucked up and people are dying and developing/worsening mental health issues. 

We‚Äôve flattened the curve for the most part. And hospitals aren‚Äôt overwhelmed AFAIK, they are actually shutting down because of a lack of patients. This was an account from a nurse.

And so we aren‚Äôt allowed to interact with people because China fucked up, and there you have it.
I have absolutely no idea what you‚Äôre taking about.
Well to be honest I‚Äôm having some anxiety but maybe I‚Äôm just overthinking things.
Why would I stay in retail with a CS degree?
Is it because the management usually has a stick up their ass and is really nitpicky/micromanaging? At the warehouse I mean?

R0? 

What do you mean we can‚Äôt control ourselves? The entire population has to be punished because a subset of people are flocking to X location? That doesn‚Äôt make any sense.

6 months is a very long time for not having regular social interaction. And the entire world is being punished, for what? Because the Chinese government is fucked up and hid the outbreak?
Still waiting on some replies from doctors, which I trust more than people claiming that ‚Äònormal‚Äô won‚Äôt ever be the same. In what regard?

Not going to be a thing for a very long time? I‚Äôve heard places are literally opening bars and restaurants as we speak. Are they supposed to wear masks and eat/drink at the same time? Sounds pretty normal to me.

Are we supposed to avoid all human contact for months on end?
Politics?
And so when should I attempt to convince my friends maybe 2-3 to drink a beer and relax in person? We have been on the decline for weeks it seems.

Force people to think? I‚Äôm sorry I don‚Äôt follow.

I‚Äôm seeing how long until people feel safe enough to interact normally.

Yes of course. 

Economies will eventually reopen soon enough, however long that is. 

Well, here‚Äôs the thing. A friend of mine just looks at the number of deaths and gets depressed. I tried telling him less than 1% of the state dying is serious but a good number for what it is. I‚Äôm concerned he‚Äôs convinced we‚Äôll be locked down for ages. What should I say to him?

So roughly how many weeks until people feel safe interacting normally?
My perspective is about the states and people‚Äôs safety.
